metadata.title: BDSM Test – Free Online Psychological Assessment | Anonymous, Safe & Privacy-Protected
metadata.description: Take a free and anonymous BDSM psychological test. Explore your psychological profile and orientation spectrum with complete local data storage and strong privacy protection.
metadata.keywords: bdsm test, bdsm test online, psychological assessment, orientation spectrum test, anonymous test, privacy protection

home.title: BDSM Test – Free Online Psychological Assessment | Anonymous, Safe & Privacy-Protected
home.description: Take a free, anonymous BDSM test designed for self-exploration. Discover your psychological tendencies and orientation spectrum. All data stays on your device.
home.keywords: bdsm test, bdsm test online, psychological assessment, orientation spectrum test, privacy protection

about.title: About BDSM Test – App Overview, Features & Tech Stack | Free Online Tool
about.description: Learn more about the BDSM Test app, including features, version details, and the tech stack. A safe, anonymous psychological assessment tool with full local data storage.
about.keywords: bdsm test, app info, features, privacy protection, tech stack

privacy.title: Privacy Policy – BDSM Test | Data Protection & GDPR Compliance
privacy.description: Read the BDSM Test privacy policy. All data remains stored locally with AES encryption. Fully GDPR-compliant and designed to respect user privacy rights.
privacy.keywords: bdsm test, privacy policy, data protection, GDPR, privacy security

bdsm_test.title: BDSM Test – Free Online Psychological Assessment | Anonymous, Safe & Private
bdsm_test.description: Free and anonymous BDSM psychological test. Understand your psychological tendencies and orientation spectrum. Data is stored locally only.
bdsm_test.keywords: bdsm test, bdsm test online, psychological assessment, orientation spectrum, anonymous test

bdsm_test_run.title: Start BDSM Test | Free Anonymous Psychological Assessment | Begin Now
bdsm_test_run.description: Start your BDSM psychological test. Answer scientifically designed questions to better understand your psychological profile and orientation spectrum.
bdsm_test_run.keywords: bdsm test, bdsm kink test, bdsm test result, start test, psychological assessment, online test

bdsm_test_result.title: BDSM Test Results | Detailed Psychological Profile & Analysis
bdsm_test_result.description: View your BDSM test results. Explore detailed psychological dimensions, insights, and personalized analysis—stored locally for full privacy.
bdsm_test_result.keywords: bdsm test, results, psychological analysis, assessment report

bdsm_test_history.title: BDSM Test History | View & Manage Previous Test Results
bdsm_test_history.description: Browse and manage your test history. Compare past results and track changes in your psychological dimensions over time.
bdsm_test_history.keywords: bdsm test, test history, history records, results management

feedback.rating_tip: How would you rate your experience with BDSM Test?

intro.title: BDSM Test – Psychological Profile & Sexual Orientation Spectrum
intro.description: Explore and quantify your psychological dimensions and sexual orientation spectrum in a safe, scientific way. All data is stored locally; no login required. Available for 18+ users.
intro.mode_quick_desc: 30 questions – Ideal for mobile or a fast test
intro.mode_standard_desc: 70 questions – Recommended mode for most users
intro.mode_deep_desc: 120 questions – Advanced mode for in-depth exploration

consent.title: Age & Privacy Confirmation
consent.description: This test is intended for self-exploration and entertainment purposes only. It is not a diagnostic or therapeutic tool.
consent.age_check: I confirm that I am 18 years or older.
consent.privacy_check_prefix: I have read and agree to the
consent.privacy_check_suffix: , and understand that all test data is stored locally and encrypted.

run.incomplete_dialog_message:
You have completed only {percentage}% of the questions. This may affect the accuracy of your results.
We recommend completing all questions for the most accurate assessment.

dimension.dominance_desc: Your comfort level and preference for taking the dominant role.
dimension.submission_desc: Your comfort level and preference for taking the submissive role.
dimension.switch_desc: Your willingness to switch roles depending on context and partner.

question.q1: In intimate interactions, I prefer to set the pace and make decisions.
question.q2: Clear guidance and instructions help me feel more comfortable and engaged.
question.q3: Depending on context and partner, I may switch between dominant and submissive roles.
question.q4: I enjoy establishing rules and boundaries and having them respected.
question.q5: Following the other person's arrangements gives me a greater sense of security.

result.title: BDSM Test Results
result.disclaimer: These results are for reference only and do not constitute medical or psychological advice.
result.no_history_description: Once you complete the test, your results will appear here.
result.clear_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history records? This action cannot be undone.
result.principle: Privacy Principle: All data is stored locally and will not be uploaded to any server.
result.email_share_body_intro:
Hello,

I'd like to share my BDSM test results with you:
result.email_share_note: Note: Visit the test page to view complete results.
result.email_share_footer: These results are for reference only and do not constitute medical or psychological advice.
result.low_progress_message: Your progress is {percentage}%. For accurate results, please complete at least 10% of the questions.
result.incomplete_progress_message: Your progress is {percentage}%. To get the most accurate results, we recommend completing all questions.
result.no_result_message: You haven't completed the test yet. Complete it to view results.
result.clear_all_data_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all data? This action cannot be undone.
result.download_pdf_hint: Use your browser's print function to save as PDF
result.download_profile_success: Use your browser's print function to save as PDF
result.history_count_message: You have {count} history records. Click a record below to view results:
result.export_simplified_message: Visit {siteUrl} for complete analysis and detailed results.

data_storage.title: Data Storage
data_storage.content: All data in the BDSM Test application is stored exclusively on your local device (using browser localStorage) and is encrypted. We do not collect, upload, or store any personal information on our servers.

anonymous_testing.title: Anonymous Testing
anonymous_testing.content: All test results are processed anonymously and are not linked to any personal identification. You may choose to share your results freely; share links only include test data, not personal information.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.content: We use AES encryption to secure all locally stored data. Encryption keys remain on your device and are never uploaded to any server.

gdpr_compliance.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr_compliance.content: BDSM Test fully complies with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) requirements:

data_minimization.label: Data Minimization
data_minimization.text: We only store the essential data needed for testing and never collect unnecessary personal information.

data_subject_rights.label: Data Subject Rights
data_subject_rights.text: You can access, modify, or delete all local test data at any time.

data_portability.label: Data Portability
data_portability.text: You can export your test results in PDF, PNG, or JSON format.

right_to_erasure.label: Right to Erasure
right_to_erasure.text: You can clear all local data—including test results, history, and share links—with a single click.

data_protection.label: Data Protection
data_protection.text: All local data is encrypted to ensure its security and privacy.

anonymity.label: Anonymity
anonymity.text: Test results are fully anonymous and not tied to any personal identification information.

how_to_clear.label: How to Clear Data
how_to_clear.text: On the test results page, click the "Clear All Data (GDPR Compliant)" button to delete all locally stored test data.

how_to_export.label: How to Export Data
how_to_export.text: On the test results page, click the "Export JSON" button to download a file containing your complete test results.

third_party_services.title: Third-Party Services
third_party_services.content: BDSM Test does not use third-party analytics, tracking services, or share any data with external parties.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please reach out via the feedback feature in the app.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to BDSM Test, the **NextJS Boilerplate** designed to help you build AI SaaS startups quickly and efficiently. At BDSM Test, your privacy is of utmost importance to us, and this privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.

information_collection.title: Information Collection and Use
information_collection.content: We collect the following types of data to provide you with a better experience while using BDSM Test:

account_info.title: Account Information
account_info.what_we_collect: **What We Collect**: This includes your name, email address, and any other information you provide when creating an account.
account_info.purpose: **Purpose**: To manage your account and provide customer support.

usage_details.title: Usage Details
usage_details.what_we_collect: **What We Collect**: Information about how you use BDSM Test, including your interactions, features accessed, and usage frequency.
usage_details.purpose: **Purpose**: To analyze user engagement and improve our services.

device_info.title: Device Information
device_info.what_we_collect: **What We Collect**: Data regarding the devices you use to access BDSM Test, such as device type, operating system, and browser type.
device_info.purpose: **Purpose**: To optimize our services for different devices and ensure compatibility.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.what_we_collect: **What We Collect**: Small data files placed on your device that help us track user preferences and improve user experience.
cookies.purpose: **Purpose**: To enhance the functionality of our services and personalize your experience.

payment_info.title: Payment and Billing Information
payment_info.what_we_collect: **What We Collect**: Information regarding your payment methods, such as credit card number, billing address, and any details required for transaction processing.
payment_info.purpose: **Purpose**: To facilitate billing and payment processing for our services.

data_storage_security.title: Data Storage and Security
data_storage_security.content: We take the security of your personal information seriously. The data we collect is stored securely on our servers, and we implement a variety of security measures including encryption and access controls to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

information_sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
information_sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties, except in the following circumstances:
items: To comply with legal obligations or respond to lawful requests from public authorities.
To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users or others.
To provide services through trusted third-party partners who assist us in operating our website or conducting our business, subject to confidentiality agreements.

changes_to_policy.title: Changes to This Policy
changes_to_policy.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "effective date" at the top of this policy. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this privacy policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
contact_us.consent: By using BDSM Test, you consent to our privacy policy and agree to its terms. Thank you for trusting us with your information!

introduction.title: Introduction and Acceptance of Terms
introduction.content: Welcome to **BDSM Test**, a NextJS boilerplate designed for building AI SaaS startups quickly and efficiently. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use our service.

use_of_service.title: Use of the Service
use_of_service.content: BDSM Test provides users with a comprehensive platform to build and launch AI SaaS startups using our pre-built templates and infrastructure. You agree to use the service in accordance with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations.

account_creation.label: Account Creation
account_creation.text: To access certain features of the service, you need to create an account. You must provide accurate and complete information during the registration process.

account_security.label: Account Security
account_security.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

user_responsibilities.label: User Responsibilities
user_responsibilities.text: You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.

intellectual_property.title: Content and Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual_property.content: All content provided through BDSM Test, including but not limited to templates, code, infrastructure setup, and documentation, is protected under copyright law. The copyright owner of BDSM Test is **BDSM Test.ai**.
items: You acknowledge that you do not own the underlying technology or intellectual property that makes up the BDSM Test service, and you agree to respect the intellectual property rights of BDSM Test.ai and any third parties.
While you retain ownership of your custom implementations and modifications, the core BDSM Test platform and templates remain the property of BDSM Test.ai.

prohibited_activities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited_activities.content: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities while using BDSM Test:
items: Unauthorized access to or distribution of our proprietary code and templates
Reselling or redistributing BDSM Test templates without authorization
Interfering with or disrupting the security or performance of the service
Using the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Attempting to bypass any security features of the service

privacy_data.title: Privacy and Data Collection
privacy_data.content: BDSM Test collects the following types of data:
items: **Account Information**: Information you provide when creating an account
**Usage Details**: Data related to your activity on our service
**Device Information**: Information about the device you use to access our service
**Cookies**: Data that helps us enhance your experience with our service
**Payment and Billing Information**: Data necessary to process payments
privacy_data.privacy_policy_link: For more details on data collection practices, please refer to our separate [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy).

pricing_payments.title: Pricing and Payments
items: All purchases are final and non-refundable unless otherwise required by law
Prices are subject to change with notice to users
You agree to pay all charges associated with your selected plan
Payment terms are based on your selected payment method and plan

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to the service at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users of the service, us, or third parties.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content: The service is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the service and disclaim all warranties to the fullest extent permitted by law.

limitation_liability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation_liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, BDSM Test.ai shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use of or inability to use the service.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless BDSM Test.ai, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorneys' fees) arising from your use of the service or violation of these Terms.

governing_law.title: Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which BDSM Test.ai operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms or the service will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with applicable laws.

changes_to_terms.title: Changes to These Terms
changes_to_terms.content: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of the service after any changes signifies your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at
contact.consent: By using BDSM Test, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Thank you for choosing BDSM Test!
